post_title: WTB: t206 Ty Cobb (Red, Green, or Bat Off)
post_content:
Looking for my first Cobb (any one of the three mentioned in the title) with great eye appeal in grades 2-3 (may stretch for a 4). Biggest things I’m looking for are great color and registration with solid centering. The Red Cobb in particular I’ve found is tough to find with exceptional image registration..

Hope I can make a deal with someone here!

Sent pm


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Still looking…if you have a similar looking Cobb as this one let me know.
Card found, easy deal with user abroome!
